Text: The Premier Forum for Real Estate Investment Professionalspst REIP The Premier Forum for Real Estate Investment Professionals February The Wigwam Resort Phoenix AZ REGISTER DOWNLOAD BROCHURE VIEW AGENDA CONFERENCE OVERVIEW ATTEND ONE OF THE REAL ESTATE COMMUNITYS MOST EXCITING EDUCATION AND NETWORKING EVENTS OF THE YEAR Join trustees and senior executives from Public and Corporate Pension Funds Foundations Endowments Family Offices High Net Worth and Wall Street as they examine key investment management issues impacting Real Estate Investment Special keynote presentation Why Real Estate Why Now Michael Giliberto Managing Director JP Morgan Fleming Asset Management With our economy in a continuing slowdown the stock market in flux and fixed income yields dropping real estate has become the closest thing to a sure bet or more accurately a stable investment As we move into an era of increased uncertainty real estate may also add a moderating force to worldwide volatility IIRs REIP will address the need for real estate investing and share strategies to help you define the characteristics of a successful real estate portfolio Join some of the leading professionals in real estate investing as they discuss cutting edge ideas and theories including What real estate opportunities exist in todays market Does international real estate pay Analyzing the legal tax and overhead issues The pros and cons of mezzanine investing Why is it so hot Getting out of an investment Should you refinance or sell Why you should invest in underserved markets and property types Sector by sector reports Discover how recent events affect individual sectors DONT MISS OUR POPULAR PRECONFERENCE WORKSHOP Once again REIP is pleased to offer the preconference workshop Real Estate Investing It is a perfect introduction to those new to the market or anyone interested in a refresher course As an added bonus the workshop will feature a special section on REITs so you can discover if this investment vehicle is right for you Dont miss out on this annual industry event To register please call or click here Please mention priority code UXXEM when registering See you in Arizona Sincerely Lauren Schulman Vice President IIR PS The Workshop sold out last year Sign up now for this standing room only event If you would prefer not to receive further messages from this sender Click on the Reply button Replace the Subject field with the word REMOVE Click the Send button You will receive one additional email message confirming your removal
